item.title: Netflix Partners With YouTuber Mark Rober, Jimmy Kimmel for Family Competition Series
item.description: Educational content creator and former NASA engineer Mark Rober is bringing his wacky experiments to Netflix in 2026 with a new kids and family competition series. Like Rober’s videos on social
